marketing: To meet the lubrication demands of specialized equipment design, Quaker State incorporated a complex additive system in QUAKER STATE^Â®^ AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION FLUID. Specially selected friction modifiers allow friction retention for long life performance. Enhanced oxidation, thermal stability and corrosion resistance insure long mileage component protection
